name: Guns N' Robots
description:
Guns N' Robots is a 3D, grid-based strategy game. You have three types of guns to place on your grid to defend against attacks from evil robots. Each of them have their own strengths and weaknesses but that's not all! The grid cell that you place a gun on has an influence on the range, power and bullet speed of your gun so you must place your guns strategically. Every battle you win, you level up and the game gets harder. What are you waiting for? Let's get started!

WebGL build is available but downloading the executable file is recommended for higher quality.

This game was created as part of the 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam, hosted by WhiteVault.
